title: Renewed Economic Uncertainty Swings Stocks, Ending Recent Lull
text:
Tuesday marked one of the most volatile sessions for stocks in weeks, underscoring worries that political uncertainty and a slowdown in economic activity will prevent major indexes from rising to new peaks.

After rising to start the day, the S&P 500 fell as much as 1.1% midday on fears that a movement by House Democrats to impeach President Trump could further destabilize the U.S. economy. Stocks then pared some of their earlier declines after Mr. Trump authorized the release of a transcript of a phone conversation he...
description: Tuesday marked one of the most volatile sessions for stocks in weeks, underscoring worries that political uncertainty and a slowdown in economic activity will prevent major indexes from rising to new peaks.
